wikipedia_page.main: John Michael Beale (16 October 1930 – September 1995) was an English professional football wing half who appeared in the Football League for Portsmouth.

response: * John Beale (writer) (c.1608–1683), English clergyman, scientific writer and Fellow of the Royal Society
* Alan John Beale (1923–2005), commonly known as John Beale, British medical scientist
